turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with placing an order at Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a salted caramel mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: iced, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I would like it hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, could I please have 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you want a venti salted caramel mocha with 2% milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and which starbucks would you like to pick that up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd it like to pick it up on Old York Road in Jenkintown, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i place that order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a venti salted caramel mocha with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on old york road in jenkinstown.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 7 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's perfect. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. I will.
